description:
Splits bundled signals into individual signals
Can be used to extract item values from dictionaries.

More: https://github.com/Cranq-io/cranq-tutorials/blob/main/reference/1_application_flow/1_3_synchronization/README.md#example---synchronizing-node-inputs.

7b39d568-3d5a-46fe-8670-3355f60c2746.description:
Receives a list of output port names matching the names of individual signals.

Must be parameter.

example:
["a","b"]
7b39d568-3d5a-46fe-8670-3355f60c2746.name: fields

6ad86184-6890-4323-8021-3496a682c98e.name: unsplit

12be78f3-a82c-4a9e-bb4e-46d61ee64ca3.description:
Sends input data split into individual fields.

"a" -> "Foo"
"b" -> "Bar"
12be78f3-a82c-4a9e-bb4e-46d61ee64ca3.name: split

name: flow/Splitter
